articles.author: Venkata Krishna B
articles.title: The South Africa plan that lifted them from lows of 2019 to success in 2023 World Cup - The Indian Express
articles.description: Prasanna Agoram, their long-time performance analyst, pokes through the debris of the past failures to trace the roots of the success in the world cup in India
articles.content: It was at their lowest ebb, when they were eliminated from the 2019 world cup, that South Africa started to focus on how to change things in the 2023 world cup in India. Post 2019 World Cup the only … [+5096 chars]
